org.reactfx

Class LazilyBoundStreamBase<S>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.reactfx.EventStreamBase<S>
      • org.reactfx.LazilyBoundStreamBase<S>
  • Type Parameters:
    S - type of the subscriber
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LazilyBoundBiStream, LazilyBoundStream, LazilyBoundTriStream

    public abstract class LazilyBoundStreamBase<S>
extends EventStreamBase<S>
    Base class for an event stream that has one or more sources (most commonly event streams, but not necessarily) to which it is subscribed only when it itself has at least one subscriber.

    • Method Detail

      • subscribeToInputs

        protected abstract Subscription subscribeToInputs()

      • firstSubscriber

        protected final void firstSubscriber()
        Description copied from class: EventStreamBase
        Called when the number of subscribers goes from 0 to 1. Overriding this method is a convenient way for subclasses to handle this event.

        This method is called after the EventStreamBase.newSubscriber(Object) method.

        Overrides:
        firstSubscriber in class EventStreamBase<S>

      • noSubscribers

        protected final void noSubscribers()
        Description copied from class: EventStreamBase
        Called when the number of subscribers goes down to 0. Overriding this method is a convenient way for subclasses to handle this event.
        Overrides:
        noSubscribers in class EventStreamBase<S>
